open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Phoenix Zone 19, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Frogfoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: -Technicians are onsite and tested a disconnection at 4.252 km, full distance of the link is 7.319 km. Frogfoot technicians are localizing the point of the break.
